org.apache.chemistry.opencmis.server.shared

Class ThresholdOutputStreamFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.chemistry.opencmis.server.shared.ThresholdOutputStreamFactory

  • public class ThresholdOutputStreamFactory
extends Object
    A factory for ThresholdOutputStream objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getMaxContentSize()
      Returns the max content size in bytes.
      int getMemoryThreshold()
      Returns the memory threshold in bytes.

      Returns the temp directory or null for the default temp directory.

      Indicates if temporary files are encrypted.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static ThresholdOutputStreamFactory newInstance(File tempDir,
                                       int memoryThreshold,
                                       long maxContentSize,
                                       boolean encrypt)
        Creates a new factory. The parameters are used to create new ThresholdOutputStream objects.
        Parameters:
        tempDir - temp directory or null for the default temp directory
        memoryThreshold - memory threshold in bytes
        maxContentSize - max size of the content in bytes (-1 to disable the check)
        encrypt - indicates if temporary files must be encrypted

      • newOutputStream

        public ThresholdOutputStream newOutputStream()
        Creates a new ThresholdOutputStream object.

      • getTempDir

        public File getTempDir()
        Returns the temp directory or null for the default temp directory.

        Returns the memory threshold in bytes.

      • getMaxContentSize

        Returns the max content size in bytes.

      • isEncrypted

        public boolean isEncrypted()
        Indicates if temporary files are encrypted.
